item.title: Reckoner推出创新型CLO交易所交易基金，实现贷款股息再投资
item.description: Reckoner资本管理公司即将推出一系列抵押贷款支持证券ETF，这些产品将自动再投资贷款股息。这一创新功能将使投资者能够自主掌控分红收取与纳税时间。【原文：Reckoner Capital Management is launching a series of collateralized loan obligation ETFs that will automatically reinvest loan dividends, a novel feature that will allow investors to control when they collect distributions and pay taxes.】

item.title: 美元走弱对经济意味着什么
item.description: 美元通常在经济或地缘政治动荡时期走强，但2026年多数不确定性和政治动荡源自美国国内——而唐纳德·特朗普总统对美元由此引发的暴跌表示赞许。 过去一年间，美元兑一篮子全球货币整体下跌9%，1月份更跌至2022年3月以来的最低点。而这种下行压力似乎并未消退。【原文：The dollar typically strengthens in times of economic or geopolitical strife, but in 2026 much of the uncertainty and political turmoil is coming from inside the US – and President Donald Trump has given a thumbs-up to the resulting plunge in the greenback. The dollar has dropped 9% overall against a basket of world currencies over the last year, and in January fell to its weakest level since March 2022. And the downward pressures don’t appear to be going away.】
